title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 101.4 - Publication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 101.4 - Publication

State Regulations

Any such sale must be preceded by a notice published in a
newspaper in the county where the sale is to take place. Such notice must be
published at least once and no later than 48 hours prior to the
sale. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
101.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
